CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests that there is no exception in front-end on page reload when breakpoint is set in HTML document and some dynamic scripts are loaded before the script with the breakpoint is loaded.
Setting breakpoint:
Reloading page.
Script execution paused.
    Dumping breakpoint storage
        dynamic-scripts-breakpoints.html:7
Script execution resumed.
Page reloaded.
